data.title: Dr Louis Botha - Somerset West Dentist
data.meta_description: Dr Louis Botha is the perfect Somerset West Dentist for you with services from basic dental healthcare to an array of cosmetic treatments - Visit Us!
data.text:
WELCOME

Dr Botha has a successful practise that prides itself in offering high quality dentistry in a friendly, professional and state-of-the-art environment.

We offer a wide range of services from basic dental healthcare such as full checkups and restorative work, to an array of cosmetic treatments to help you get that winning smile. We are absolutely committed to ensuring completed satisfaction and this is why all our patients leave our practise with a smile on their face.

It does not stop there: our cosmetic work is backed by a satisfaction guarantee so there is no need to fret. Give us a call and book your consultation today. We cannot wait to revive and reinvent your smile.
